forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
